statements: SELECT * FROM task_lists
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_deadline FROM task_lists WHERE assigned_to = 'Alice'
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM task_lists ORDER BY task_deadline DESC
SELECT task_name, assigned_by FROM task_lists WHERE task_deadline > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM task_lists WHERE assigned_to = 'Bob' AND assigned_by = 'Alice'
SELECT * FROM task_lists WHERE task_name = 'Publish Blog Post';
SELECT task_name, task_deadline FROM task_lists WHERE task_deadline >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT * FROM task_lists WHERE assigned_by = 'John Doe' ORDER BY task_deadline DESC;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to FROM task_lists WHERE task_deadline < '2022-12-31' AND task_description LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT task_name FROM task_lists WHERE assigned_to IN ('Alice', 'Bob') ORDER BY task_deadline ASC;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_id = 2;
SELECT task_id, assignee_id FROM tasks WHERE due_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role_name = 'Developer';
SELECT member_name, role_name FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 1 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE task_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT task_name, member_name, role_name FROM tasks t JOIN team_members tm ON t.assignee_id = tm.member_id;
SELECT * FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 2 AND due_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY task_name;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE assignee_id = 3 AND due_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM task_list;
SELECT task_name, description FROM task_list;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM task_list WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT * FROM team_members ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'developer';
SELECT * FROM task_list WHERE status = 'open';
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM task_list WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'developer';

SELECT task_list.task_name, team_members.member_name FROM task_list JOIN task_assignment ON task_list.task_id = task_assignment.task_id JOIN team_members ON task_assignment.member_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT task_list.task_name, task_assignment.assigned_date FROM task_list JOIN task_assignment ON task_list.task_id = task_assignment.task_id WHERE task_assignment.status = 'in progress';
SELECT * FROM tasks;
SELECT task_id, task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE due_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assigned_to, COUNT(*) as num_tasks FROM tasks GROUP BY assigned_to;
SELECT list_name, created_at FROM task_lists ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT task_name, description, due_date FROM tasks WHERE assigned_to = 'John' ORDER BY due_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT task_name, due_date FROM tasks WHERE due_date > NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY ORDER BY due_date;
SELECT * FROM task_lists WHERE created_by = 'Alice' AND list_name LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT member_name, email FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Manager' OR role = 'Supervisor';
SELECT list_name, COUNT(task_id) AS total_tasks FROM task_lists LEFT JOIN tasks ON task_lists.list_id = tasks.task_id GROUP BY list_name HAVING total_tasks > 3 ORDER BY total_tasks DESC;
SELECT * FROM task_lists;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to_user_id FROM task_lists WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, name, role FROM team_members ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT task_id, comment FROM task_comments WHERE task_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT task_id, assigned_to_user_id, assigned_at FROM task_assignments ORDER BY assigned_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM task_lists;
SELECT task_name, assigned_to_user_id, deadline FROM task_lists WHERE assigned_to_user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to_user_id, deadline FROM task_lists ORDER BY deadline DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, assigned_to_user_id, deadline FROM task_lists WHERE deadline >= '2022-12-31';

SELECT t.task_id, t.task_name, tm.name AS assigned_to_name, ta.name AS assigned_by_name FROM task_lists t JOIN team_members tm ON t.assigned_to_user_id = tm.user_id JOIN team_members ta ON t.assigned_by_user_id = ta.user_id;
